data.text: I recently stayed at this hotel and had a wonderful experience thanks to the exceptional service provided by the staff ..I highly recommend this hotel not only for its comfortable accommodations but also for the outstanding service provided by Meryem, Sonia, Chaimaa, and Mohamed. Their dedication and professionalism truly made my stay exceptional.
data.title: Amazing hotel

data.text:
We came to Voco Monaco as part of a birthday celebration. From start to finish it had been fantastic. The transfer by boat from the canal is a great way to start the vacation.
The staff are fantastic and will assist in any way they can.
It was very quiet during the weekend we stayed and while it’s marketed as a party hotel with 24hr pool access, non stop pay music from afternoon until early hours of the morning, it certainly is a party place. It was just a shame that it was so quiet here. There were just two of us at the swim up pool bar last night.
The pool is the biggest open air pool in the region and offers plenty of sun beds, chairs and side tables to enjoy the pool anytime of day or night.
The beach is really nice, with big double sun-beds to relax overlooking the sea with only the few scattered islands to spoil your view, if you can call it spoiling your view that is. It’s mega!!!

Breakfast is included at the buffet restaurant and the manager Sahid and g his team of waiters and chefs will certainly not disappoint.

For me it was a great experience to enjoy in the quiet time what will be a very popular destination for a party.
data.title: Voco Monaco - Heart of Europe

data.text:
Voco Monaco was one of my favorite places for vacation. If you want to have an amazing time, make sure to visit there at least once! 

The cleanliness and smell was just amazing!
Towels, its detergent such as shampoo, shower gel  and the body lotion all smell like heaven! The room was always clean thanks to the housekeepers Kamlesh and Maylin 

Friendly personnel and staff, they will accommodate guests pleasantly and welcoming.

Delicious foods and they’re designed internationally like a top-rated restaurant.
Sahid , Zakriya , Veronica and Warda will serve you the food with respect.

Good vibes around the hotel, playing music daylong 
Amenities are so entertaining, ping pong, and water sports  
Swimming pool, There are different kinds of tubs in the pool in which you can get tanned while you drinking your cocktail! 
Beach bars are amazing and the bartenders are pretty qualified to serve you the best cocktails
The Internet access is just awesome.

Looking forward to coming back there.
data.title: Memorable moments in the Voco Monaco Hotel in Dubai

data.text: Sahid and Veronica were absolutely amazing for facilitating our trip. Highly recommended!! Amazing food and drinks! This venue is without doubt 5 stars, although not fully constructed this does not deter the facilities and service. To summarise, paradise island!
data.title: Outstanding location

data.text:
Well managed and serviced , Great hospitality from whole crew from Kitchen , Restaurent  to housekeeping . If you are looking for a retreat in Dubai . Strongly recommended . Easy to access business locations in 18 to 20 minutes .

Special thanks to the crew running the beach bar and La brasserie for breakfast . Christian the head chef requires a special mention for the energy he carries in offering some great food .
data.title: Pearl hidden among the rocks for a great stay in Dubai
